en.MAINTOOLBAR:
Main Toolbar
&Save Particle System Save the selected particle system
Undo Undo the last change
Redo Redo the undone change
Zoom Extents Zoom to the extents of the particle systems's bounds (middle mouse button)
Camera Mode
&Free Camera Change the camera mode to a free camera
X-locked camera Change the camera mode to an x-locked camera
Y-locked camera Change the camera mode to an y-locked camera
Z-locked camera Change the camera mode to an z-locked camera
&Orbit Camera Change the camera mode to an orbit camera
Camera Speed
&Slow Motion Set the camera movement speed to slow
&Medium Motion Set the camera movement speed to medium
&Fast Motion Set the camera movement speed to fast
&Super Fast Set the camera movement speed to super fast
Background Set the background colour
Background Display
Terrain Use terrain as the background
Floor Use floor as the background
None Use no background
Grid Toggle the 1x1m measurement grid
Bounding Box Show the particle system bounding box
Play/Stop
Spawn Spawn the current particle system
Stop Stop the current particle system
Pause Pause the current particle system
